data.title: Mediterranean Penthouse 4BHK Design - Bachelor Pad for Corner Plot on Tight Budget
data.description: This design follows Mediterranean aesthetics and adheres to local building norms and Vastu principles. The floor plan is optimized for energy efficiency, natural lighting, privacy, and a comfortable living environment.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central open-plan living space with Mediterranean decor featuring natural light through large windows and a small indoor-outdoor transition area.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Compact dining area adjacent to the kitchen. Incorporates local motifs and minimalistic design.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen designed with space-saving elements and Mediterranean tiles on countertops for a budget-friendly update.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated quiet office space near the living area to maximize natural light while ensuring privacy through smart placement and soundproofing elements. Incorporates a small meeting table with ergonomic chairs.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located on the corner to enhance privacy, with built-in closets and a meditation niche following Vastu principles for tranquility.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom that maintains an open feel while integrating privacy screens for flexibility in layout.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Another guest bedroom with convertible features to serve as a study or lounge space if needed.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Well-insulated area for home theater on the ground floor. Features integrated seating arrangements and soundproof walls to minimize noise disturbance in other areas.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Main entrance with a vestibule that aligns with the corner plot orientation per Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Back Door
openings.description: Secondary exit to the terrace area for additional light and ventilation, ensuring energy efficiency.

openings.name: Balcony Window
openings.description: Window overlooking the rooftop terrace that provides a natural connection to outdoor space while following Mediterranean design aesthetics.

openings.name: Rooftop Access
openings.description: Elevated staircase or elevator door leading to the rooftop terrace area.

terrace.description: Rooftop Terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings with Mediterranean landscaping including drought-resistant plants, low-maintenance furniture arrangements, and a pergola structure for shade.
